Sequence Information.Source: Gill, spleen, kidney, etc.; Golden pompano,Trachinotus ovatus

Literature.Author: Sun Y, Chen X, Xu Y, Liu Q, Jiang X, Wang S, Guo W, Zhou Y. 2017
Literature.Title: Thymosin beta 4 is involved in the antimicrobial immune response of Golden pompano, Trachinotus ovatus

Sequence Information.Comments: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 68% similarity toC. gigas beta-thymosin.  Molecular formula:  C207H347N53O80S1; Mol Wt4916.378; GRAVY= -1.55; Wimley-White whole-residue hydrophobicity of the peptide: 26.45   kcal/mol.Activity: Active against Gram- E. tarda, V. harveyi (a bioluminescent marine bacterium), and Gram+ S. agalactiae (also known as group B streptococcus or GBS). In addition, it is involved in antibacterial immune response.
